expo.name: CarbClean - Mobile CARB Testing
expo.description: The #1 mobile CARB compliance testing app for Northern California truckers. Book tests with OCR, track compliance, 24/7 AI support.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CarbClean needs camera access to scan VIN numbers from your vehicle for fast booking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CarbClean needs photo library access to select VIN images for OCR scanning.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow CarbClean to access your camera to scan VIN numbers.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow CarbClean to access your photos to select VIN images.
